text:
hi guys, hello from Hint, one of my developers and I, are going to inbound this year, so we want to go to this meetup to talk with the comunity, we do the RSVP on the splash site but no email was receive after that :disappointed:, thas normal?
In other things, if some of you go to the inbound event the rest of the week, what you recommend of the general agenda to check and reserve the next week (aug 8)?
